EmailTemplate.name: The Hive Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to The Hive!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome {!User.FirstName}!
We are excited to have on the Summit, let's start collaborating! The Hive is our internal community that makes it easy to find resources, chat with team members and keep up on all the 7Summits news.
We encourage you to look over the Training documentation and attend the training session for utilizing our tools: https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1GgeJpN_Dqjd_ASF8yQ0-EzHxynjNO06oMyhw0xFagXw/edit?usp=sharing
Your User Name: {!User.Username}
Get Started:
Go to https://hive.7summitsinc.com and login with your Salesforce credentials. Fill in your profile and add your profile photo Update your settings to ensure you are receiving emails Follow your Department group Follow Hive Buzz Comment on a News article
To the Summit!
